Reviews.Title: Nice TV
Reviews.Author: SK
Reviews.Content: This 40" Tv is a great picture and will work for anyone looking for a 40" TV, the slim design allows you to hang it like a picture on the wall if you so choose.

ProductInfo.Features:
Full HD 1080p Resolution
Wide Color Enhancer allows you to see picture color the way the director originally intended.
Clear Motion Rate of 240 - Experience sharp picture quality, even when you are watching fast-moving images like sports or action movies.
Built-in Wi-Fi
ENERGY STAR V 5.3 Compliant
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung UN40ES6150 40" Class LED 6150 Series Smart TV
